title: Looking to make a Plat + ranked 5s team
body: looking for an adc,support,top and jungle to make a plat+ ranked 5 team. must have a way to com with the team. we have a coach that is challenger and also looking to play 3/4 days a week together. add me in game if ur keen

replies.body: Plat 1 Adc only main im down any space? 0r can i sit on bench just looking for extra team practice :)
I'm a plat support main. Still around if you need
Only a support needed for the remaining role
